|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = v5.0 |cpu1spd = 775 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6SB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = A8:5E:45 |oui = A8:5E:45 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 5GHz WLAN FEM;Qorvo;QPF4551;45F1, 7672, 61747;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.50.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE (T&W) |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/23/2019 |estreldate = 06/01/2019 |estprice = |upc = 8192876412459 |ean = 4718017412452 |newegg = |asin = B07MQ67TJK |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B07J32TJ4R |asin_country2 = GB |multirev2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9888; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Model: [[ASUS RT-AC57U v2]] (AC1200) {{See also|ASUS RT-AC57U}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5502 WiSoC :MIPS 74Kc (v5.0) @775MHz *WLAN: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5502/QCA9888 :802.11n 2T2R (300Mbps, 2.4GHz) :802.11ac 2T2R (867Mbps, 5GHz) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports ===FCC info=== "S418015A_02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Additional models covered by this FCC certification include: *[[ASUS RT-AC57U v2]] (B1) • ([[ASUS RT-ACRH12]]) :*[[ASUS RT-AC1200GE]] • (AC1200) *[[ASUS RT-AC58U v2]] (B1) • ([[ASUS RT-ACRH13]]) :*[[ASUS RT-AC1300G+ v2]] (GP/G PLUS) (B1) *[[ASUS RT-AC59U]] (A1) • ([[ASUS RT-ACRH15]]) :*[[ASUS RT-AC1500G+]] (GP/G PLUS) :*[[ASUS RT-AC1500UHP]] "All models are electrically identical, different model names are for marketing purpose" ===GPL info=== {{SCollapse2|[https://github.com/lukasz1992/asuswrt-r3g/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak GPL info] |
export RT-AC59U: IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 QCA=y QCN550X=y QCA9888=y BBEXTRAS=y 
  USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y USB="USB" APP="network" 
  AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC59U" RTAC59U=y SHP=y NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y EXT4FS=y 
  OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y 
  FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y YANDEXDNS=y \
	NEWSSID_REV4=y LAN50=all GETREALIP=y \
	NTFS="open" TFAT=n HFS="open" DISK_MONITOR=y \
	BLINK_LED=y BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y \
	DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y \
	JFFS2=y PSISTLOG=y QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y\
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y UTF8_SSID=y NVRAM_ENCRYPT=y
}} ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac57u_v2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== ;:[https://www.asus.com/Networking/Wireless-Routers-Products/ ASUS Wireless Routers
